text: Reginald George Boyle (3 March 1903 – 1 May 1986) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). He played his debut for Collingwood during the 8th Round in 1925. == Notes == == External links == * *Reg Boyle's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1903 births Category:1986 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Reg Boyle
